name: Pathfynder
description:
Game made in ~3 hours for Trijam 114. Theme being "Smoke without fire". 

I took an abstract approach from the theme where the idiom generally means if you see something, you can expect something. So if you see no platforms, you can expect no platforms, right? Well that's not always the case :)

Controls

  • WASD to move
  • Mouse to look

Assets used:

  • Universal Sound FX for the foot sound effects
  • Ultimate Game Music Collection for all other sounds
